description.name: Hybula Coinify
description.tagline: Integrates the new Coinify API into WHMCS.
description.long: Integrates the new Coinify API into WHMCS allowing you to accept crypto currency payments.
features: Works with Production or Sandbox environment.
Marks invoices as paid using the new webhooks.
Notifies admins in case there is an issue with the payment (e.g. overpayment or underpayment).
UUIDv4 generation straight from your gateway configuration.
